Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 11), dh-exec, dh-python, python3-pyqt5, pyqt5-dev-tools, gfortran, autoconf, bison, flex, zlib1g-dev, libhdf5-mpi-dev (>= 1.8.8~), libcgns-dev (>= 3.3.0~), mpi-default-dev, libmedc-dev, libblas-dev | libatlas-dev, libopenmpi-dev, python3, libscotch-dev, tango-icon-theme
Build-Depends-Indep: doxygen, graphviz, fig2ps, texlive-latex-recommended, texlive-fonts-recommended, texlive-latex-extra
Package-List: code-saturne deb science optional arch=any code-saturne-bin deb science optional arch=any code-saturne-data deb science optional arch=all code-saturne-doc deb doc optional arch=all code-saturne-include deb science optional arch=any
